docs.lead_paragraph: The furniture in the sitting room of the old Merriam mansion was in keeping with the age, the solidity, and, above all, the personality of the structure. For houses which have preserved their continuity until majority, which likely enough accrues at the half-century stage, have an air, a countenance, a bearing, individual and unmistakable.
